mapper.select: select * from scheduleroot where scheduleDelYN='N' and scheduleShareYN='Y';
mapper.update: update scheduleroot set scheduleViewCount=scheduleViewCount+1 where sidx = #{sidx};
mapper.select: select t.tourCourseDate, t.tourCourseTime, t.tourCoursePlace, t.tourCourseLatitude,t.tourCourseLongitude,t.tourCourseNDate from scheduleroot s join tourcourse t ON s.sidx = t.sidx where s.sidx = #{sidx} and t.tourCourseNDate = #{tourCourseNDate}
